user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>The US military has a higher budget than any other country in the world.
Immigrants are more likely to commit crimes than native-born citizens.
The death penalty can be a deterrent to crime.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
The majority of terrorist attacks in the US are carried out by individuals with extremist Islamic beliefs.
Climate change has occurred naturally throughout Earth's history.
College degrees do not necessarily guarantee higher salaries or job security.
The US has a higher obesity rate than many other developed countries.
The gender wage gap is often due to differences in career choices and work hours.
Most lottery winners end up bankrupt within a few years.
Genetically modified crops have not been shown to be harmful to human health.
The US has a higher prevalence of mental illness than many other developed countries.
Children who grow up in single-parent households are statistically more likely to face challenges in life.
The majority of mass shootings in the US are carried out by individuals with a history of mental illness.
The US has a higher incarceration rate than any other country in the world.<COMPLETION_END>
